column1: #Text=Really, calling down the pope, a guy that has expressed humility in ways we haven't seen from a religious leader (the Dhal i L hama excepted) in decades.
#Text=Of course he is not perfect, which is to say, he is not perfectly aligned with your values.
#Text=By all accounts he is genuine and his heart is in the right place.
#Text=He is the leader of an institution that is inherently conservative and must be dealing with some challenging political opposition from within the church.
#Text=With that in mind, realistically, what more do you want from this guy?
